item.title: If life is always like first seeing - Adelaide (3) Slow City, Flying Life
item.description: (3) Slow City, Flying Life Time doesn’t fly, life does. When we arrived at Adelaide city, it’s almost dark. We lived in a hotel opposite to the University of Adelaide. It’s not far from CBD, on the back there’s a street full of retailers. I went out to the street with X-Pro2 and 35mm f2 lens, I’ve read people saying 50mm equivalent focal length is too narrow for today’s street, I think the key is to keep in mind what your lens could see, and look for things that can be framed, regardless of whether the street is narrow or wide.
